articles.title: Indian politician Baba Siddique shot dead in Mumbai - BBC.com
articles.description: Siddique was a senior political figure in Maharashtra state, which is due to hold elections next month.
articles.content:
An Indian politician has been shot dead in the commercial capital, Mumbai. 
Gunmen opened fire on Baba Siddique, 66, near the office of his son, who is also a politician, according to local media re… [+1354 chars]
